BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: WORLD FEDERATION OF YOUTH CLUBS INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO DEVELOP, ADVANCE AND ENHANCE GLOBAL YOUTH ORGANIZATIONS THAT PROVIDE A POSITIVE ENVIRONMENT AND A SAFE PLACE FOR YOUNG PEOPLE AROUND THE WORLD.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE WORLD FEDERATION OF YOUTH CLUBS (WFYC) IS A MEMBERSHIP-BASED ORGANIZATION, WORKING WITH AFFILIATE ORGANIZATIONS TO CREATE THE CONDITIONS, STRUCTURES, AND RESOURCES TO BUILD A GLOBAL YOUTH DEVELOPMENT MOVEMENT WHERE WFYC MEMBERS RETAIN AUTONOMY AND RECEIVE TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE, ACCESS TO A PROFESSIONAL NETWORK, AND OTHER CRITICAL RESOURCES.
IRS990.Desc: WFYC SERVES AFFILIATE ORGANIZATIONS IN THREE DISTINCT AREAS. GUIDANCE & CONSULTATION - WFYC PROVIDES PERSONALIZED ASSESSMENT SERVICES AND HIGH-TOUCH TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE IN CRITICAL AREAS OF ORGANIZATIONAL DEVELOPMENT, INCLUDING: - BOARD DEVELOPMENT - STAFF DEVELOPMENT - FINANCE & ADMINISTRATION - RESOURCE DEVELOPMENT - MARKETING & COMMUNICATIONS - SAFETY & FACILITIES - PROGRAM CURRICULUM - TECHNOLOGY & SYSTEMS - STRATEGIC PLANNING - OUTCOMES MEASUREMENTNETWORKING & LEARNING OPPORTUNITIES - WFYC LOOKS TO CURATE KNOWLEDGE ACROSS A RANGE OF YOUTH DEVELOPMENT MODELS TO IMPROVE ORGANIZATIONAL EFFICIENCIES, DEVELOP YOUTH PROFESSIONALS, AND ENHANCE THE WORK OF BOARD VOLUNTEERS. THESE OPPORTUNITIES INCLUDE: - WFYC ANNUAL INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE - MONTHLY WEBCAST SERIES - SHARING OF BEST PRACTICES - FORMAL AND INFORMAL NETWORKING OPPORTUNITIES AMONG AFFILIATE MEMBERSADVOCACY & RECOGNITION - WFYC ADVOCATES ON BEHALF OF THE INTERNATIONAL YOUTH DEVELOPMENT MOVEMENT, BRINGING AWARENESS TO THE IMPACT OF YOUTH CLUBS AND YOUTH DEVELOPMENT PROFESSIONALS WORLDWIDE. RECOGNITION OPPORTUNITIES INCLUDE: - WFYC ANNUAL PROMISE AWARDS: CELEBRATING YOUTH, YOUTH DEVELOPMENT PROFESSIONALS AND INNOVATIVE PROGRAMMING OF AFFILIATE MEMBERS - CHALLENGE GRANTS: PASS THROUGH FUNDING PROVIDED TO WFYC AFFILIATES TO SUPPORT GROWTH AND INNOVATION

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION WAS FORMED IN 2019 AS A CALENDAR YEAR-END ENTITY. DURING 2020, THE ORGANIZATION CHANGED ITS YEAR-END TO 6/30. ACCORDINGLY, 2019 REPRESENTS A COMBINATION OF TWO SHORT YEARS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS REVIEWED AND EVALUATED THE RELEVANT TECHNICAL MERITS OF EACH OF ITS TAX POSITIONS IN ACCORDANCE WITH GUIDANCE ESTABLISHED BY THE FASB AND DETERMINED THAT THERE ARE NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT WOULD HAVE A MATERIAL IMPACT ON THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS OF THE ORGANIZATION.
RENT INCOME OFFSET BY RENT EXPENSE
RENT EXPENSE OFFSET BY RENT INCOME

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AFFILIATE ORGANIZATIONS ARE REQUIRED TO PROVIDE MONTHLY STATUS UPDATES IN WRITING TO THE WFYC REGARDING THE USE OF THESE FUNDS. IF DIFFERENT PLANS ARISE FOR THE FUNDS, THE AFFILIATE MUST PRESENT CHANGES IN WRITING FOR WFYC CONSIDERATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: RICK GOINGS AND SUSAN GOINGS HAVE A FAMILIAL RELATIONSHIP. WFYC BOARD SECRETARY, ELINOR STEELE, IS EMPLOYED BY AN ORGANIZATION WITH WHICH RICK GOINGS AND SUSAN GOINGS ARE ASSOCIATED AS DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE ARE NO COMMITTEES THAT HAVE THE AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE GOVERNING BODY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS FIRST REVIEWED BY MANAGEMENT, AND THEN DISTRIBUTED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR REVIEW AND COMMENTS BEFORE FILING THE 990 WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICTS ARE MONITORED ACTIVELY DURING BOARD MEETINGS OR DURING OTHER CONVERSATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE UTILIZED EXTERNAL COMPENSATION SURVEYS AND OTHER FORM 990'S TO DETERMINE THE COMPENSATION AND THE PROCESS WAS DOCUMENTED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS FORM 1023 AND FORM 990 AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NO DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.
